embed.description:
EssentialsX officially supports the **CraftBukkit**, **Spigot**, and [**Paper (recommended)**](https://papermc.io/) server software running the following Minecraft versions:
‚Ä¢ ‚úÖ **1.20.4** and **1.19.4** - Actively developed and supported versions
‚Ä¢ ‚ö†Ô∏è **1.8.8 ‚Üí 1.18.2** - Still supported, but not a priority and may be dropped in a future release

EssentialsX **does not support** the following Minecraft versions and server software:

footer.text: We will not be able to provide support if you use any of the unsupported software or versions listed above.

fields.name: ‚Ä¢ ‚ÑπÔ∏è 1.20.5 / 1.20.6
fields.value: **1.20.5/6 are not supported yet. Do not attempt to compile and use current versions of EssentialsX on such versions - you may lose userdata.**

fields.name: ‚Ä¢ ‚ÑπÔ∏è Folia
fields.value: **Folia is not supported yet. Do not attempt to use current versions of EssentialsX on Folia or forks of it - you may lose userdata.**

fields.name: ‚Ä¢ üõë "Ultra-performance" Paper forks (Akarin, Yatopia, etc.)
fields.value: These often perform non-standard behavior and can break your worlds and installed plugins.

fields.name: ‚Ä¢ üõë Forge/Bukkit hybrid servers (Mohist, Cauldron, Thermos, Magma, CatServer, etc.)
fields.value:
EssentialsX is built for the Bukkit API, which does not properly support mods.
For Forge servers, use [SpongeForge](https://www.spongepowered.org/downloads/spongeforge) with [Nucleus](https://nucleuspowered.org), or an alternative mod for [Forge/Fabric](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods).

fields.name: ‚Ä¢ üõë 1.7.10 or below
fields.value: Please don't use versions that were made <t:1403740800:R>
